verses.verse: Ephraim <WH669> feeds <WH7462> on wind, <WH7307> And pursues <WH7291> the east <WH6921> wind <WH6921> continually <WH3605>; <WH3117> He multiplies <WH7235> lies <WH3577> and violence. <WH7701> Moreover, he makes <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with Assyria, <WH804> And oil <WH8081> is carried <WH2986> to Egypt. <WH4714>
The Lord <WH3068> also has a dispute <WH7379> with Judah, <WH3063> And will punish <WH6485> Jacob <WH3290> according to his ways; <WH1870> He will repay <WH7725> him according to his deeds. <WH4611>
In the womb <WH990> he took <WH6117> his brother <WH251> by the heel, <WH6117> And in his maturity <WH202> he contended <WH8280> with God. <WH430>

Yes, he wrestled <WH8280> with the angel <WH4397> and prevailed; <WH3201> He wept <WH1058> and sought <WH2603> His favor. <WH2603> He found <WH4672> Him at Bethel, <WH1008> And there <WH8033> He spoke <WH1696> with us,
Even the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of hosts; <WH6635> The Lord <WH3068> is His name. <WH2143>
Therefore, return <WH7725> to your God, <WH430> Observe <WH8104> kindness <WH2617> and justice, <WH4941> And wait <WH6960> for your God <WH430> continually. <WH8548>
A merchant, <WH9212> in whose hands <WH3027> are false <WH4820> balances, <WH3976> He loves <WH157> to oppress. <WH6231>

And Ephraim <WH669> said, <WH559> "Surely <WH389> I have become <WH6238> rich, <WH6238> I have found <WH4672> wealth <WH202> for myself; In all <WH3605> my labors <WH3018> they will find <WH4672> in me No <WH3808> iniquity, <WH5771> which <WH834> [would be] sin. <WH2399>"

But I [have been] the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> since <WH4480> the land <WH776> of Egypt; <WH4714> I will make you live <WH3427> in tents <WH168> again, <WH5750> As in the days <WH3117> of the appointed <WH4150> festival. <WH4150>
I have also spoken <WH1696> to the prophets, <WH5030> And I gave <WH7235> numerous <WH7235> visions; <WH2377> And through <WH3027> the prophets <WH5030> I gave <WH1819> parables. <WH1819>

Is there iniquity <WH205> [in] Gilead <WH1568>? Surely <WH389> they are worthless. <WH7723> In Gilgal <WH1537> they sacrifice <WH2076> bulls, <WH7794> Yes, <WH1571> their altars <WH4196> are like the stone <WH1530> heaps <WH1530> Beside <WH5921> the furrows <WH8525> of the field. <WH9583>
Now Jacob <WH3290> fled <WH1272> to the land <WH7704> of Aram, <WH758> And Israel <WH3478> worked <WH5647> for a wife, <WH802> And for a wife <WH802> he kept <WH8104> [sheep.]
But by a prophet <WH5030> the Lord <WH3068> brought <WH5927> Israel <WH3478> from Egypt, <WH4714> And by a prophet <WH5030> he was kept. <WH8104>

Ephraim <WH669> has provoked <WH3707> to bitter <WH8563> anger; <WH3707> So his Lord <WH136> will leave <WH5203> his bloodguilt <WH1818> on him, And bring <WH7725> back <WH7725> his reproach <WH2781> to him.
